info.name: Sirchester Armchair
info.description: in keeping with the new philosophy of Serralunga, a timeless piece belonging to international history of design enjoys a new interpretation.  Its name: Sirchester.The concept was clear from the beginning: design a sofa for the outdoors that is both comfortable and functional and rediscover the atmosphere  and style of the Chester. Its characteristic shape and size was entrusted to the companyâ€™s creative and technical know-how whereby using a rotating molding machine, they were able to keep the same distinctive particularities found in the original English sofa like the padded quilted backrest.
